splice2neo 0.1.2
  • Reference
  • Changelog

Reference

Parse SpliceAI

Functions to parse SpliceAI output into standard splice junction format

parse_spliceai()

Parse VCF output file from spliceAI as table

format_spliceai()

Formats spliceAI output and filter for predicted effects

annotate_spliceai_junction()

Annotate splice variants with resulting junctions

Parse MMsplice

Functions to parse MMsplice output into standard splice junction format

parse_mmsplice()

Parse .csv file from MMsplice output as data.frame

annotate_mmsplice()

Annotates the mmsplice output with additional columns including the junction as junc_id.

get_exon_inclusion_junction()

Compute the resulting junctions (junc_id) for exon inclusion of given exon and transcript.

get_exon_skipping_junction()

Compute the resulting junction (junc_id) for exon skipping of given exon and transcript.

Parse LeafCutter

Functions to parse LeafCutter output into standard splice junction format

import_leafcutter_bam()

Imports "_Aligned.out.bam.junc" file from Leafcutter output

import_leafcutter_counts()

Imports "_perind.counts.gz" from Leafcutter output.

leafcutter_transform()

Imports "_perind.counts.gz" and "_Aligned.out.bam.junc" from Leafcutter output and transforms the raw output into standardized junction output format

leafcutter_transform_format()

Transforms Leafcutter intermediate files into standardized format

transform_leafcutter_bam()

Transforms Leafcutter bam junc file

transform_leafcutter_counts()

Transforms Leafcutter counts file into standardized junction format.

Parse SplAdder

Functions to parse SplAdder output into standard splice junction format

import_spladder()

Imports SPLADDER output from a given path with ".confirmed.txt.gz" files.

spladder_transform()

Imports SPLADDER output from a given path and transforms it into standardized junction format

spladder_transform_format()

Transforms Spladder output into standardized junction format

spladder_transform_a3ss()

Transforms events from alternative 3' splice sites from SPLADDER output format into standardized junction format

spladder_transform_a5ss()

Transforms events from alternative 5' splice sites from SPLADDER output format into standardized junction format

spladder_transform_intron_retention()

Transforms events resulting from intron retention from SPLADDER output format into standardized junction format

spladder_transform_mutex_exon()

Transforms events resulting from mutually exclusive exons from SPLADDER output format into standardized junction format

spladder_transform_exon_skipping()

Transforms events resulting from exon skipping from SPLADDER output format into standardized junction format

Annotate

Functions to annotate splice junctions

add_tx()

Annotate splice junctions with affected transcript IDs

add_context_seq()

Annotate splice junctions with resulting transcript sequence

modify_tx()

modifies transcripts by applying splice-junctions

get_junc_pos()

Get the position of input junction in the transcript sequences

add_peptide()

Annotate splice junctions with resulting CDS and peptide sequence

seq_truncate_nonstop()

Truncate input sequence after input position before next stop codons (*).

Requantification

Functions for read support re-quantification with easyquant

map_requant()

Maps the re-quantification result from Easyquant on the junction-transcript centric tibble by hash id.

read_requant()

Imports the re-quantification results from analysis with easyquant.

transform_for_requant()

Creates a table with context sequences for re-quantification analysis with Easyquant.

Canonical

Functions annotate and filter for cnaonical splicing

is_canonical()

test if junction is canonical junction

Merge and filter

Functions annotate and filter for cnaonical splicing

is_in_rnaseq()

test if junction was found in corresponding RNA-seq data

combine_mut_junc()

Combines tibbles with junctions from SpliceAI and MMsplice

add_identified_in_RNA()

This is a wrapper function to directly map the information if a junction predicted from WES data was found in RNA-seq by leafcutter or spladder

generate_combined_dataset()

Combines tibbles with junctions from Spladder and Leafcutter into a combined dataset of expressed splice junctions

Others

Other functions

junc_to_gr()

Convert a splice junction ID into a GRanges object

change_to_junction_rules

Rules on how a splicing affecting variant creates a junction

next_junctions()

Get genomic coordinates of possible next donor and acceptor sides.

sort_columns()

Sorts columns of junction output file in the following order: "junction_start", "junction_end", "strand", "chromosome", "Gene", "class", "AS_event_ID", "junction_id"

unsorted_junc_df

A tibble in junction format but unsorted columns

transform_leafcutter_bam()

Transforms Leafcutter bam junc file

transform_leafcutter_counts()

Transforms Leafcutter counts file into standardized junction format.

Data

Toy example datasets

toy_cds

An example CDS annotation GRangesList from a subset of human genome

toy_junc_df

An example dataset of 18 splice junctions from human (hg19) genome as a data.frame

toy_junc_id

An example dataset of 18 splice junctions in junc_id fomrat from human (hg19) genome as character vector

toy_junc_id_enst

An example dataset of 18 transcript IDs matching to the junctions in toy_junc_id

toy_transcripts

An example transcript annotation GRangesList from a subset of human genome

toy_transcripts_gr

An example dataset of full transcript ranges from a subset of human genome.

unsorted_junc_df

A tibble in junction format but unsorted columns

spladder_output.a3ss

A tibble containing events from alternative 3' splice sites identified by Spladder

spladder_output.a5ss

A tibble containing events from alternative 5' splice sites identified by Spladder

spladder_output.exonskip

A tibble containing events from exon skipping identified by Spladder

spladder_output.intronreten

A tibble containing events from intron retention identified by Spladder

spladder_output.mutexon

A tibble containing events from mutually exclusive exons identified by Spladder

spladder_output

A list of tibbles with each list containing events from a different splicing class identified by Spladder

leafcutter_juncs

A tibble with junction in standardized format. example data

spladder_juncs

A tibble with junction in standardized format. example data

canonical_juncs

A tibble with canonical junctions and their source (comma, separated). example data
